location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires, Teheran [Tehran]

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, acknowledges Henry Willock's letter of 9 January 1824, which requested information on trade in the Persian Gulf. Stannus states that he has taken preliminary steps to obtain the necessary information. He informs Willock that he will delay any further reply until he can ascertain whether his enquiries are likely to be of any assistance in framing Willock's report to Government.
